name: Jacob O. Duldulao
label: Computer Science Student and Peer Adviser at Mapúa University

contact.location: 6875 Washington St., Brgy. Pio Del Pilar, Makati City, Philippines

summary:
Computer Science Student specializing in Artificial Intelligence at Mapúa University Makati where I work as a student assistant and peer adviser helping other students with their coursework.

Areas of interest include AI, machine learning, cloud computing, web development, and cybersecurity research.

work_experience.summary: Work under the Center for Student Advising (CSA) Department providing services to support students in addressing academic, personal, social, and career adjustment problems.
highlights: Assist students in developing their academic plans and help them adjust to college life
Provide peer adviser tutoring services to students struggling with coursework
Support CSA department in delivering comprehensive student advisory services

research_publications.title: Advanced Phishing Techniques Research
research_publications.summary: Literature review analyzing Adversary-in-the-Middle and Browser-in-the-Browser attacks in modern cybersecurity, published in CIT Journal.
research_publications.journal: CIT Journal of Computing and Information Technology
highlights: Published research in CIT Journal of Computing and Information Technology
Analyzed sophisticated phishing methods that bypass traditional security
Developed practical defense recommendations for cybersecurity teams

research_publications.title: Few-Shot Learning for Occupancy Detection Using Wi-Fi Beamforming Feedback
research_publications.summary: Privacy-focused system that detects and counts people using Wi-Fi beamforming feedback with meta-learning architecture. Ongoing capstone thesis.
highlights: Combines few-shot learning with Wi-Fi beamforming data
Adapts to new environments with just 1-10 training samples
Led research methodology design and multi-environment data collection

projects.title: crAIvings - AI-Powered Restaurant Feedback Analysis
projects.summary: Web application leveraging AI to analyze restaurant reviews, providing actionable insights to restaurant owners.
highlights: AI-powered sentiment analysis and review categorization
Actionable insights dashboard for restaurant owners
Helps diners make informed decisions based on analyzed feedback

projects.title: FindMe: School Lost and Found System
projects.summary: Modern web-based Lost and Found Management System designed to streamline reporting, tracking, and claiming lost items on campus.
highlights: Streamlined process for reporting and tracking lost items
Web-based interface for easy campus-wide access
Efficient matching system for lost and found items

projects.title: Colemak Without AltGr
projects.summary: Modified Colemak keyboard layout for Windows without AltGr functionality, optimized for IDE usage with hotkey shortcuts.
highlights: Custom keyboard layout modification for improved productivity
Optimized for development workflow in IDEs like VSCode

references.name: Jennifer P. Tecson
references.relation: CSA Staff - Center for Student Advising
references.reference: Jacob really cares about helping other students and he's good at it. He knows his stuff and actually listens when students are struggling. You can count on him to show up and do the work.

references.name: Leanna Mae A. Cruz
references.relation: Life Coach - Center for Student Advising
references.reference: As Jacob's supervisor, working with Jacob has been great. He just gets how to talk to students who are having trouble with their classes. He's smart but doesn't make people feel dumb, and students actually come back to him for help.
